name: Campanja AB
description: Provider of services to improve search engine marketing. The company uses high frequency bidding and real time tracking to give its customers the most value for their subscriptions. It also offers an artificial intelligence, which looks at keyword search historical trends.
one_liner: Provider of services to improve search engine marketing. The company uses high frequency bidding and real time tracking to give its customers the most value for their subscriptions. It also offers an artificial intelligence, which looks at keyword search historical trends.
